response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand its worth to you is $8,000, and I appreciate your interest. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $9,500. This offer reflects my desire to share this valuable item with someone who appreciates it as much as I do, while also ensuring a fair return on my investment. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you require further information. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 9500}
